trans-unit.source: Represents a find request sent by a client.
trans-unit.target: 表示客户端发送的查找请求。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindRequestContext" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindRequestContext" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint discovery metadata to send back to the client.
trans-unit.target: 要发送回客户端的终结点发现元数据。

trans-unit.source: Enables the discovery service to send results back to the client as they are received.
trans-unit.target: 启用发现服务，以便在接收到结果时将其发送回到客户端。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindRequestContext" /> sent by the client.
trans-unit.target: 获取与客户端发送的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindCriteria" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindRequestContext" />。

trans-unit.source: The find criteria sent by the client.
trans-unit.target: 客户端发送的查找条件。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint discovery metadata to send back to the client.
trans-unit.target: 要发送回客户端的终结点发现元数据。

trans-unit.source: Called after the user adds an endpoint to the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindRequestContext" /> by calling <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindRequestContext.AddMatchingEndpoint(System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata)" />.
trans-unit.target: 在用户通过调用 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindRequestContext" /> 将一个终结点添加到 <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Discovery.FindRequestContext.AddMatchingEndpoint(System.ServiceModel.Discovery.EndpointDiscoveryMetadata)" /> 后被调用。
